description:
In this course, Emiel sleegers gives us a comprehensive introduction to prop placement, environment setup, and general level design within CryEngine. Not only will we hit the ground running with a basic look at the UI, we'll also be covering how to realistically and logically place objects in a level so that the scene makes sense and flows effortlessly. We'll also be covering how to light and add additional compositing effects, and finally to wrap things up, we'll add particles for some additional environmental realism. If you've ever wanted to get a jump-start with building levels in CryEngine, this course is for you!

More about the Instructor:

Emiel Sleegers is a self-taught 3d artist currently residing in the Netherlands. He's been teaching himself 3D art for the past 3-4 years, and has worked as a freelance artist on numerous unannounced projects. He's a lover of all things 3d and enjoys sharing the knowledge he has obtained with others eager to learn.
title: Learn the basics of building levels with CryEngine
